Posts.Content: Lymph Glands/ Lymph Node sensitvity on neck with breast cancer Had an ultrasound and have not heard from my PCP but the technician says that the neck LN are working overtime due to the ones removed under my arm (axillary dissection) when I had my lumpectomy. Does this make sense and should I be really concerned
Posts.Title: Lymh Glands/Lymph Node swelling in neck with breast cancer
